query: SELECT id, name, bundle_config FROM reminder_templates WHERE is_bundle = 1 LIMIT 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4WYXdTZ2RFuJQah.8fcf44c6f992 --database SwQCxo7pxW6R8kkqwZSJsv --execute SELECT id, name, bundle_config FROM reminder_templates WHERE is_bundle = 1 LIMIT 1;

rows.name: Standard Broiler Cycle (42 Days)
rows.bundle_config: [{"category": "house_preparation", "enabled": true, "name": "House Preparation", "reminders": [{"dayOffset": -7, "description": "Complete house sanitation: Remove all old litter and organic matter. Wash walls, floors, and all equipment with detergent. Apply approved disinfectant (e.g., quaternary ammonium or glutaraldehyde-based) ensuring proper contact time per manufacturer instructions. Allow house to dry completely. This 7-day downtime between flocks is critical for breaking disease cycles.", "name": "Day -7: Sanitize House", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": -5, "description": "Flush header tank and all water lines including nipple drinker lines with high-level chlorine solution (140 ppm). Allow 24-hour contact time, then flush thoroughly with clean fresh water. Replace mini floater reservoir and any worn nipples or seals. Test water flow at multiple points to ensure adequate pressure and no blockages.", "name": "Day -5: Flush Water System", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": -3, "description": "Set up brooder area: Spread fresh, dry bedding material (wood shavings or rice hulls) to 5-10cm depth. Lay chick paper covering at least 50% of the brooding area for easy feed access during first week. Position empty fountains (14-16 per 1,000 chicks) in brooding area. Ensure nipple drinkers are set at chick eye level. Check litter moisture (target 20-25%).", "name": "Day -3: Prepare Brooder Area", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": -1, "description": "Pre-heat chicken house to 32-35°C (90-95°F) at chick level. With forced air heating, verify floor temperature reaches at least 32°C. Target relative humidity of 30-50%. Monitor temperature uniformity across the entire brooding area using multiple thermometers. Check all heating equipment is functioning properly. Verify ventilation minimum settings.", "name": "Day -1: Pre-heat House", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": 0, "description": "Ensure all feed lines are completely full and feed is visible at all feeding points. For first 7-10 days, provide supplemental feeders (paper, trays, or lids) at a rate of one tray per 50 chicks. Place automatic feeders on floor level for easy chick access. Verify feed quality - no mold, contamination, or off-odors.", "name": "Day 0: Fill Feed Lines", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": 0, "description": "Mix stress-pack (electrolytes/vitamins) in header tank according to manufacturer dosage. Fill all fountains with stress-pack water before chick arrival. Ensure water temperature is lukewarm (20-25°C) - not cold. Chicks must have immediate access to medicated water upon placement to combat transport stress and encourage early hydration.", "name": "Day 0: Prepare Stress-Pack Water", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": 0, "description": "Complete final walkthrough checklist: Temperature 32-35°C at chick level, humidity 30-50%, all drinkers functioning with water at eye level, feed accessible on paper/trays, lighting at 30-40 lux, ventilation providing fresh air without drafts, biosecurity measures in place (footbaths active, visitor log ready). Record all readings. Prepare chick receiving area.", "name": "Day 0: Final Inspection Before Placement", "priority": "urgent"}]}, {"category": "vaccination", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 0, "description": "Administer Marek's disease vaccine to day-old chicks", "name": "Day 1 - Marek's Disease Vaccination", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": 7, "description": "First dose of Newcastle disease vaccine via drinking water", "name": "Day 7 - Newcastle Disease (First Dose)", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 14, "description": "Administer Infectious Bursal Disease (Gumboro) vaccine", "name": "Day 14 - Gumboro Disease Vaccination", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 21, "description": "Booster dose of Newcastle disease vaccine", "name": "Day 21 - Newcastle Disease (Booster)", "priority": "high"}]}, {"category": "feed_transition", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 0, "description": "Begin with starter feed (high protein 22-24%)", "name": "Day 0 - Start Starter Feed", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 10, "description": "Prepare for transition to grower feed, start mixing", "name": "Day 10 - Prepare Grower Feed Transition", "priority": "medium"}, {"dayOffset": 14, "description": "Complete transition to grower feed (20% protein)", "name": "Day 14 - Complete Grower Feed Transition", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 28, "description": "Begin finisher feed (18% protein) for market preparation", "name": "Day 28 - Transition to Finisher Feed", "priority": "high"}]}, {"category": "environmental_check", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 0, "description": "Verify brooding temperature at 32-35°C, check heat source", "name": "Day 1 - Initial Brooding Temperature Check", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": 7, "description": "Gradually reduce temperature, check ventilation", "name": "Day 7 - Reduce Temperature to 29-32°C", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 14, "description": "Continue temperature reduction, monitor bird behavior", "name": "Day 14 - Temperature Adjustment to 26-29°C", "priority": "medium"}, {"dayOffset": 21, "description": "Set final growing temperature, optimize ventilation", "name": "Day 21 - Final Temperature Setting 21-24°C", "priority": "medium"}]}, {"category": "biosecurity", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 0, "description": "Verify house disinfection, footbaths ready, visitor log in place", "name": "Day 0 - Pre-Placement Biosecurity Check", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": 7, "description": "Check footbath effectiveness, equipment sanitization, pest control", "name": "Day 7 - Weekly Biosecurity Audit", "priority": "medium"}, {"dayOffset": 14, "description": "Review visitor logs, check perimeter security, rodent control", "name": "Day 14 - Mid-Cycle Biosecurity Review", "priority": "medium"}, {"dayOffset": 28, "description": "Prepare for catching crew, verify transport biosecurity", "name": "Day 28 - Pre-Harvest Biosecurity Protocol", "priority": "high"}]}, {"category": "milestone", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 7, "description": "Sample weight check - target 170-180g, assess uniformity", "name": "Day 7 - First Week Weight Check", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 14, "description": "Weight check target 450-500g, calculate FCR, mortality review", "name": "Day 14 - Two Week Performance Review", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 21, "description": "Weight target 900-1000g, FCR should be ~1.4, assess flock health", "name": "Day 21 - Three Week Assessment", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 35, "description": "Final weight assessment, FCR calculation, market readiness check", "name": "Day 35 - Pre-Market Evaluation", "priority": "urgent"}]}, {"category": "performance_alert", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 3, "description": "Review first 72-hour mortality - should be <1%, investigate if higher", "name": "Day 3 - Early Mortality Check", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": 10, "description": "Compare growth to standards, adjust feed if underperforming", "name": "Day 10 - Growth Rate Assessment", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 21, "description": "Cumulative mortality should be <3%, FCR on target, uniformity >85%", "name": "Day 21 - Mid-Cycle Performance Review", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 30, "description": "Project final weights, calculate expected yield, plan harvest date", "name": "Day 30 - Final Performance Projection", "priority": "high"}]}]
